item.title: Disabled Americans Fear What Medicaid Cuts Could Do to Them
item.description: The White House says roughly $1 trillion in Medicaid cuts won’t limit home- and community-based care. Health care experts disagree.

item.title: Crucial Court Hearing Begins in Harvard Case Against Trump
item.description: A hearing in Boston on Monday is expected to shape the future of negotiations between the White House and the nation’s oldest university.
